question: Which country's paramilitary intelligence force is "Tonton Macoute"?
explanation: The Tonton Macoute was a special operations unit within the Haitian paramilitary force created in 1959 by dictator Francois Duvalier. In 1970 the militia was renamed the Volunteers of the National Security. Haitians named this force after the Haitian mythological bogeyman, Tonton Macoute, who kidnaps and punishes unruly children by snaring them in a gunny sack and carrying them off to be consumed at breakfast.
